Basic explanation of words
mistaken
chuÇn
Mistakes, confusion: Mistakes (a. Wrong; b. Unexpected things; c. Ragged, staggered). Arrogantly. The fate is ill-fated.
Violation: èˆ›è¿•. Lun is always good.

["Guangyun" Chang Yan cuts, up and down, Chang. ]
Also known as "åƒ¢1".
(1) Go against. See "Chi".
(2) Differences, differences.
(3) Not going well.
(4) Interaction; interleaving.
(5) Confusion; error.
